title: BAN FOR NO REASON
body: i got banned for no reason for a old toxic chat and i have stop with the moments of me being toxic and finish my game and find out that i have only been warned ONCE but i didnt nothing wrong after that a old ban that came back and got me perma banned i want to get my account unlocked because i dont deserve this perma ban like ive made mulitiple accounts and still getting banned eaither people dont like my play style or there just find me bad or other things and when i report a toxic player u let it slide so why choose me over and over idk im not that special i dont even have fam on ur game all i was doing was enjoying my time playing come out AND BOOM PERMA BANNED I WANT THIS to be reversed please i dont feel like 1 warning was enough i should have gotten more like my second but nope just got a perma one straight on the spot

replies.body:
If you believe you've been falsely punished, you should appeal by sending a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (use the "Discuss a personal suspension or restriction" option). The Support agent will manually review the case and determine if the punishment was made in error, and possibly reduce/remove the punishment based on that.

The standard progression for chat-related punishments is chat restrictions (10-game then 25-game) then bans (14-day then permanent). If you've skipped any of those punishments, it may be the result of behaviour that generally results in escalation, such as racism, homophobia, suicide encouragement etc. Without further context (such as the chat logs) you probably wont be able to get any feedback from the boards.
